statement.name: INSERT_SMAEXL
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smaexl( nroexl, codprs, tpoprs, codunv, nomcar, funexl, logexl, fchvin, fchret, tpoexl, sqlbkr) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAEXL
statement.sql: UPDATE smaexl SET codprs=?, tpoprs=?, codunv=?, nomcar=?, funexl=?, logexl=?, fchvin=?, fchret=?, tpoexl=?, sqlbkr=? WHERE nroexl=?
